text:
In today's lesson we're looking at a 
bit of the love story between Monica and
Chandler. Specifically how they got engaged!

And if you are new here well I want to welcome you 
to our community where we help you to understand

fast speaking natives without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles!

Just like Kanishk who says that there is no 
more fun way to learn to understand natives.

So hit that Subscribe button and the Bell down 
below so that you don't miss a single new lesson.

Do you ever get confused by how we natives speak 
English? We emphasize some words, we reduce

others, some seem to disappear altogether.
Isn't it frustrating?

Well if you want to understand natives like a 
master and even laugh at the jokes then I highly

recommend you check out our Fluent with Friends 
Course. Now every week you get PDF Power Lessons

to help you to understand 100% of the episode, 
vocabulary memorization software, so that you

never forget the new words and expressions and 
access to our Fluency Circle Global Community,

so that you can practice everything you 
learn and make friends around the world.

The best part you can try for FREE 
right now with our 3-Part Masterclass.

Click up here or down the 
description below to sign up.

So Chandler is set on making Monica 
believe he doesn't want to get married.

However now that Richard has come into 
the scene he might be playing with fire.

Unfortunately Chandler's plans 
turn into a complete fiasco.

So how'd you do on the quiz? Did you get 
100% or do you still have some work to do?

Well next I highly recommend that 
you watch this lesson where we look

at the love story between Ross and Rachel, 
let's check out a clip from that lesson.
